ygData.subject: Re: everyone wants her but they ain't getting her
ygData.msgSnippet: Giant bots arn t allowed, but gestalts are (with special permission). Oblitertron is 5 bots combined, he isn t one single huge bot. Oblitertron did grab

Giant bots arn't allowed, but gestalts are (with special permission). 
Oblitertron is 5 bots combined, he isn't one single huge bot.

Oblitertron did grab Squishy already, but I'll accept that his hand is 
charred.

Also, you forgot to post for Thrash's, DevilDuer's, and Hurricane's shots on 
Depth Charge.

::Oblitertron/DevilDuer::

Oblitertron growls, taking a few steps back to keep his balance from the 
twister under him. Inside his mind, Dark One was giving orders.

"In a few seconds we seperate," his voice sounds to the other Oblitercons, 
"I'm going to get this femm back to base. You four take out these Maximals."

Firing a final optic shot at Arcangel, Oblitertron lifts Squizzy to his 
chest, a panel sliding aside as he drops her into a compartment. The gestalt 
begins to separate, four bots resulting from the huge bot in a few seconds.

Dark One, with Squizzy inside his cockpit, launches off, heading for the 
Alliance base. His cockpit was simply a space with walls inside it, no 
computers or outlets. Seeing that Squizzy was awake, Dark One activates an 
innercom.

"Calm yourself," he says into the cockpit, "You'll be repaired soon."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro laughs, transforming into vehicle mode and firing a blast of fire at 
DepthCharge. Breakdown transforms into a HUMVEE, his machine gun firing off 
at Arcangel.

Hiss and Scavanger run toward the Maximals, firing at them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer gruts as two ion disks hit him in the side, sending him tripping 
sideways over a rock. He jumps up, wincing at the pain as he returns fire at 
Depth Charge.
